column4: So I can copy and paste your line instead of the one I have Besogon?
I changed only three parametrs :"default" -you will boot in won 7 by default, "timeout" -and "hiddenmenu" Just change only them
You have "default  0" (line 14) it is Ubuntu, "default 1" it is Ubuntu recovery, 2 is a memtest, and 3 is Win 7
